root.name: Elven Legacy
root.description: OverviewElven Legacy is a classical turn-based RPG with a branching storyline and additional multiplayer modes. The Elves much defend themselves against a shadow from their past. The game also includes an powerful built-in game editor for mods. Three DLC packs were released in late-2009: Elven Legacy: Magic Elven Legacy: Seige Elven Legacy: Ranger System Requirements MinimumOperating System: Microsoft® Windows® XP / VistaProcessor: Intel® Pentium® IV 1.5 GHz or AMD® 2000 (single core)Memory: 512 MB RAMHard Disk Space: 3 GB Available HDD SpaceVideo Card: NVIDIA® GeForce™ FX 5700 or ATI™ Radeon® 9600 and above Video CardSound Card: DirectX-compatible Sound CardDirectX® Version: DirectX® Version 9.0c (4.09.0000.0904) RecommendedOperating System: Microsoft® Windows® XP / VistaProcessor: Intel® Pentium® IV 2.4 GHz or AMD 3500 (single core)Memory: 1 GB RAMHard Disk Space: 3 GB Available HDD SpaceVideo Card: NVIDIA® GeForce™ 6800 or ATI™ Radeon® X850XTSound Card: DirectX-compatible Sound CardDirectX® Version: DirectX® Version 9.0c (4.09.0000.0904)There is no guarantee that the game will function properly on notebook PCs.

similar_games.game: Age of Fear: The Undead King
